events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the tracking info still shows it as shipped with no update, and I have not received my package yet.
The issue has been categorized as a delivery delay based on the customer's message regarding the late shipment.
The case was assigned to a customer support representative to investigate the delayed delivery.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll look into this immediately.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status of your shipment?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 742 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield.
I have contacted the courier service and it appears your package is delayed due to unforeseen shipping issues. We expect delivery within 3 business days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you following up. I’ll wait for the package over the next few days.
We consider this case resolved as your order is now actively en route and expected very soon. Please reach out if there are any more issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your package and everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the package has been delivered successfully and there are no further concerns, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
